Action.author: scottz
Action.body: Try to reproduce locally and debug.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: I reproduced this issue in local network.. Didn't find much information from the logs. Debugging this further and will share the details.

Action.author: scottz

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: Per earlier comment, these tests are essentially duplicates, and we would like to halt development of the test framework which is being deprecated.
